{{Spoiler}} {{Infobox_NPC |name = Oggy |image = Oggy.png |personality = |time_active = |gender = Male |race = [[City|Citizen]] |age = 23 |location = [[Agnus Castle Region]] ([[Ascension Grounds]]) }} '''Oggy''' is a character in {{XC3}}. == Overview == Oggy is a [[Lost Numbers]] soldier, subordinate of [[Ghondor]], and ally of [[Aggy]]. == Story == == Affinity Links == {{XC3 Affinity Link | npc1 = Oggy | npc2 = Aggy | affinity = pink | caption = Sworn brothers | direction = both }} {{XC3 Affinity Link | npc1 = Oggy | npc2 = Mini Tirkin | affinity = yellow | caption = I big bro Tirkin, kraa! | direction = left }} == Battle == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Oggy |image = XC3 Oggy Battle.jpg |caption = Oggy |category = [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] |type = [[Lost Numbers (enemy)|Lost Numbers]] |level = 45 |area = [[Li Garte Prison Camp]] ([[Central Cell]]) |spawntime = Story |respawn = No |movement = Ground |detection = |exp = 904 |cp = 30 |sp = 0 |gold = 0 |hp = 168,200 |strength = 293 |healing = 291 |dexterity = 127 |agility = 115 |physdef = 10% |ethdef = 0% |critrate = 0% |guardrate = 0% }} '''Oggy''' is a [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] in {{XC3}}. He is a [[Lost Numbers (enemy)|Lost Numbers]] soldier, and is fought alongside [[Ghondor]] and [[Aggy]] at level 45 in the [[Central Cell]] of [[Li Garte Prison Camp]]. Story progression will occur regardless of the outcome of the battle. === Resistances === {{XC3 Resistances |break = 20% |knockback = 90% |blowdown = 90% |physdebuff = 25% |etherdebuff = 20% }} === Enraged === {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:55%;" !Trigger |Enemy is reduced to 50% HP. |- !Effects |Boosts damage dealt by 25%. |} {{clr}} === Arts === {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:120%;" !Name !Attribute !Targets !Hits !Power !Reactions/Statuses !Notes |- |'''''Auto-Attack 1''''' |Physical |One Target |1 |100% | | |- |'''''Auto-Attack 2''''' |Physical |One Target |1 |100% | | |- |'''Bright Flame Wisdom''' |Stance |Self | - | - | |style="text-align:left;"| *During the stance, regenerate 0.5% of HP every 3.0s and boost Art recharge speed by 100%. *Immune to all reactions and combos when executing Art. |- |'''Rock Grinder''' |Physical |One Target |1 |250% |[[Break (XC3)|Break]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Immune to [[Knockback (XC3)|Knockback]] and [[Blowdown (XC3)|Blowdown]] during Art. |- |'''Mountain Smasher''' |Physical |One Target |1 |200% |[[Blaze (XC3)|Blaze]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Immune to Knockback and Blowdown during Art. |- |'''Spearquake''' |Physical |One Target |1 |300% |[[Daze (XC3)|Daze]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Immune to Knockback and Blowdown during Art. *Daze is only inflicted if target is suffering from [[Topple (XC3)|Topple]]. |- |'''Bestial Crash''' |Physical |Frontward AOE |1 |200% | |style="text-align:left;"| *Immune to Knockback and Blowdown during Art. |- |'''Bright Flame Spear''' |Physical |AOE around User |1 |350% |[[Target Lock]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Immune to Knockback and Blowdown during Art. |} == Challenge Battle Mode == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Oggy |image = |caption = Oggy |type = [[Lost Numbers (enemy)|Lost Numbers]] |movement = Ground |area = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |category = [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle Boss]] |level = 65 |detection = |spawntime = During ''[[Gauntlet: Intermediate]]'' |respawn = No |hp = 524,880 |strength = 1,294 |healing = 1,227 |dexterity = 294 |agility = 231 |physdef = 10% |ethdef = 0% |critrate = 20% |guardrate-front = 20% |guardrate-side = 10% |guardrate-back = 0% }} Oggy is fought at level 65 alongside [[Aggy#Challenge Battle Mode|Aggy]] at Stage 40 of the [[Archsage's Gauntlet]] [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge]] ''[[Gauntlet: Intermediate]]''. === Skills === Oggy has the following skills: * Deals 10% less damage but takes 30% less damage. * Boosts Arts recharge speed by 25%. === Resistances === {{XC3 Resistances |break = 50% |knockback = 90% |blowdown = 90% |physdebuff = 70% |etherdebuff = 70% }} === Enraged === {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:55%;" !Trigger |Enemy is reduced to 50% HP. |- !Effects |style="text-align:left;"|Boosts damage dealt by 50%.
Boosts Art recharge speed by 50%. |} === Arts === Oggy uses the same Arts set as in the story boss fight. {{clr}} == Gallery == === Artwork === Aggy Oggy Ghondor Concept.png|Oggy Concept Art === In-Game Renders === XC3 Oggy Icon.png|Oggy's Affinity chart icon Oggy Guest.png|Oggy's Guest Icon {{clr}} {{XC3CharNav}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Supporting Characters]] [[Category:Agnus Castle Region NPCs]] [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:Lost Numbers]] [[Category:XC3 Lost Numbers Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 41-45 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 61-65 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]]

{{quote|An Attacker who smashes through foes' defenses with a huge hammer and unstoppable Arts.|Class menu description}} [[File:XC3 Ogre Weapon Icon.png|thumb|180px|The Ogre class icon]] '''Ogre''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|破砕士}}, ''Hasai-shi'', Crusher) is an [[Agnus|Agnian]] [[Attacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] in {{XC3}}. == Overview == Ogres specialize in smashing [[Enemy (XC3)|enemies]] vigorously with a super-heavy hammer, a powerful weapon with a heavy blow, and also has [[Battle Arts (XC3)|arts]] that can nullify enemy guards. Because of its high attack power, it is easily [[Aggro|targeted]] by enemies. The Talent Art of the Ogre class is [[Pressure Drop]]. It is the initial class of [[Sena]]. {{clr}} == Class Aptitude and Unlock Requirements == {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:100%; valign:center;" !Party Member |[[File:Icon chara battle n0ah.png|60px]]
'''[[Noah]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 1.png|60px]]
'''[[Mio]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 2.png|60px]]
'''[[Eunie]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 3.png|60px]]
'''[[Taion]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 4.png|60px]]
'''[[Lanz]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 5.png|60px]]
'''[[Sena]]''' |- !Aptitude |[[File:XC3 Aptitude D Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude C Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude A Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude S Icon.png|35px]] |- !Class Unlock Points Required |3,940 |1,575 |3,150 |2,365 |0 † |''Starting Class ‡'' |} † Acquired automatically in Chapter 2, after viewing the "Consul K" event (which occurs after resting at the [[Hillside Ferronis Hulk]] during the main story)
‡ Sena starts at Rank 8 in the class when in the player's party for the first time. == Class Rank Requirements == {| class="xc1 centered" width="45%" ! Rank ! CP needed ! Nopon Coin Cost |- | 1 | colspan="2" | None |- | 2 | 140 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 3 | 140 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 4 | 175 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 5 | 175 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 6 | 210 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 7 | 210 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 8 | 225 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 9 | 225 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 10 | 245 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | colspan="3" class="event" | Complete ''[[Side Story: Sena]]'' |- | 11 | 320 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 12 | 320 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 13 | 425 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 14 | 425 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 15 | 535 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 16 | 535 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 17 | 640 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 18 | 640 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 19 | 690 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 20 | 800 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |} {{clr}} == Class Stats == The Ogre class grants the following multipliers to a character's base stats (see their individual pages for their base stats), and sets their Physical and Ether Defense to the following values, depending on their current Rank. Intermediate values are linearly interpolated between the minimum and maximum values, rounding to the nearest percent. {| class="xc1 centered" width="100%" ! Rank !! HP !! Attack !! Healing Power !! Dexterity !! Agility !! Physical Defense !! Ether Defense |- | 1 || 75% || 110% || 20% || 90% || 80% || 15% || 5% |- | 10 || 77% || 115% || 22% || 95% || 82% || 17% || 7% |- | 20 || 80% || 120% || 25% || 100% || 85% || 20% || 10% |} === Weapon Stats === The character's Attack stat after being modified by the above class stats is further modified by adding the class's weapon stat, which depends on the character's [[Level (XC3)|Level]], to obtain the final base Attack stat. These weapon stats also determine the character's Critical Rate and Block Rate. Characters temporarily assume these weapon stats to calculate relevant statistics when using a Master Art from this Class without it being part of a Fusion Art. If a Master Art is used in a Fusion Art, the character's current Class will be used instead for calculations. If the weapon is [[Blade Upgrade|upgraded]], all values in the table are increased by 20% (multiplicatively) for the character wielding it (fractions are rounded to the nearest integer). {| class="xc1 centered" width="60%" ! Level !! Attack !! Critical Rate !! Block Rate |- | 1 || 20 || 10% || 5% |- | 10 || 44 || 11% || 6% |- | 20 || 79 || 12% || 7% |- | 30 || 123 || 13% || 8% |- | 40 || 171 || 14% || 9% |- | 50 || 229 || 15% || 10% |- | 60 || 292 || 16% || 11% |- | 70 || 362 || 17% || 12% |- | 80 || 441 || 18% || 13% |- | 90 || 531 || 19% || 14% |- | 99 || 620 || 20% || 15% |} == Arts == * '''[[Pressure Drop]]''' ([[Battle Arts (XC3)|Talent Art]]), [[Launch (XC3)|Launch]] * '''[[Big Impact (XC3)|Big Impact]]''', Front [[Blowdown (XC3)|Blowdown]] * '''[[Hammerhead (XC3)|Hammerhead]]''', Side Attack ↑ * '''[[Giant Swing]]''', [[Knockback (XC3)|Knockback]] (Rank 1 Master Art) * '''[[Maximum Voltage (XC3)|Maximum Voltage]]''', Unblockable/Atk Up (Rank 10 Master Art) * '''[[Cannonball]]''', [[Daze (XC3)|Dazed]] ↑ == Class Skills == * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 28.png]] '''Fighting Prowess''': Boosts damage dealt by physical Arts by 30-50%. (Rank 5 Master Skill) * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 10.png]] '''Insult to Injury''': Boosts damage dealt when attacking [[Topple (XC3)|toppled]] enemies by 60-150%. * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 10.png]] '''Dynamite Spirit''': Boosts damage dealt by 20-60% when HP is at 90% or higher. (Rank 15 Master Skill) * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 14.png]] '''Fury Smash''': Increases reaction success rate by 10-45 percentage points. === Stat Increases === {| class="xc1 centered" style="width:80%;" !Class Rank !Insult to Injury !Fury Smash !Fighting Prowess !Dynamite Spirit |- | 1 | 60% | 10% | 30% | 20% |- | 5 | 70% | 15% | 35% | 30% |- | 10 | 80% | 20% | 40% | 40% |- | 15 | 135% | 30% | 45% | 50% |- | 20 | 150% | 45% | 50% | 60% |} == Gallery == XC3 Sena Artwork.png|Sena as an Ogre Ogre Noah.png|Noah as an Ogre Ogre Mio.png|Mio as an Ogre Ogre Eunie.png|Eunie as an Ogre Ogre Taion.png|Taion as an Ogre Ogre Lanz.png|Lanz as an Ogre {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Classes]]
